meanings.definition: The simultaneous execution of multiple processes on a computer system.
meanings.sent1: In our office, the multiprocessings of data entry and analysis saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent2: The server's efficiency was due to its ability to handle multiprocessings seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The multiprocessings of printing documents and making coffee at the same time led to some interesting results.
meanings.sent4: Her brain felt like a whirlwind of multiprocessings, each thought racing ahead of the next.
meanings.sent5: The orchestra conductor's hands moved in perfect synchrony, like the multiprocessings of a well-oiled machine.

meanings.definition: The act of processing multiple tasks or operations at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The company's success was attributed to its efficient multiprocessings of customer orders and inventory management.
meanings.sent2: His ability to handle multiprocessings under pressure made him a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle multiprocessings of answering emails and attending a meeting proved to be quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The multiprocessings of organizing a party while studying for exams felt like a balancing act on a tightrope.
meanings.sent5: The factory's production line moved with the precision of multiprocessings, each step seamlessly flowing into the next.
